questions.question:
What is the time complexity of the following loop?

for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  sum++;
}

How many primitive operations are in this loop?

for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  x = x + 1;
}

What is the complexity of nested loops?

for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
    count++;
  }
}

What is the complexity of this loop?

for (int i = 1; i < n; i = i * 2) {
  work();
}

How many operations are in this snippet?

x = 1;
y = 2;
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  z = x + y;
}

What is the complexity of this code?

for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
    count++;
  }
}
What is the Big-O of constant-time operations?
What is the time complexity of binary search?

Primitive counting: How many operations?

for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
    x++;
  }
}
What is the time complexity of the Fibonacci recursive algorithm?
What is the complexity of inserting at the front of an ArrayList?
What is the complexity of inserting at the front of a LinkedList?

How many operations?

for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
    for (int k = 0; k < n; k++) {
      x++;
    }
  }
}
What is the complexity of merge sort?
What is the best-case complexity of bubble sort?
Which of the following has exponential complexity?
What is the complexity of finding max in an unsorted array?

Primitive counting for this loop?

for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
  for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
    x = x + 1;
  }
}
What is the complexity of accessing an element in a HashMap (average case)?
Which of the following represents logarithmic complexity?
